name: Feeding Frenzy (itch) (Poema Games)
description:
Feeding Frenzy is a small game in which the player guides a tiny creature called a Feeder to become bigger than all other Feeders! In order to grow, help it hunt as many other, smaller Feeders as possible. Keep in mind that the more your Feeder eats, the slower it becomes! Each Feeder has a unique ability.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Use unique ability

All feedback is most welcome!

 extra info: 

Feeding Frenzy is part of my small challenge where I attempt to release one new, small game every week.
